page.title: 11FARM ANIMALS
page.content: Farm Animals Blackhead There are 2 herds of Fresian milking cows with followers of about 70 cows. One herd of 70 Guernseys grazes Chynhalls Farmland but this now belongs to Penmarth Farm. There is a beef farm at Treleaver. Little Pednavounder land now belongs to Trelan and carries 90 beef animals. Old Royal Air Force buildings at Trewillis are used to house cows. A minimal desease herd of pigs is kept in old RAF buildings at Trewillis.The farm also has some new building which can be seen from the Hotel and the Coastal footpath.Breeding animals are sold all over England. Free range chickens are kept for home consumption.
